td.content: s:pt presents with mild dry skin, moderate tingling in feet. pt also reports of mild rapid breathing. pt is a 28 YO white female web developer. o:Height 167 cm, Weight 45.4 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 17, Heart = RRR, PMI not displaced, no murmurs, normal S1/S2, Eyes = yellowish white discoloration noted on the retina and microaneurysms, appears in NAD, Extremities = no edema, no skin breakdown, 2 + dorsalis pedis pulses a:Type 1 Diabetes p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed insulin detemir - 0.29 unit/kg subcutaneous daily, and ordered Glucose Tolerance, 3Hr panel.
